txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Knotted Heartwood from the Huorns in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Heroes of Limlight Gorge.
You have turned in the knotted heartwood for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough knotted heartwood to complete your task.
Heroes of Limlight Task: Knotted Heartwood
Someone has posted a task to collect knotted heartwood from Huorns. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the knotted heartwood to any task-board in Great River
You have accepted a task to acquire knotted heartwood.
Wanted: Knotted Heartwood from the Huorns in the Great River region.
